EmailTemplate.subject: Join the Live Different trip that will change your life all over again!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Live Different Builds
Go to livedifferent.com | Email Us | 1-866-432-4464
Hello again!
For some of you, it's been a long time since you've heard from Live Different, while others may have just joined us on a trip this year. Either way, we're really excited to announce a new kind of trip designed specifically with YOU in mind - an Alumni Build Trip for returning volunteers!
(If you're wondering what a 'Build Trip' is, we've changed the name of our Hero Holiday program to Live Different Builds - for more info on the name change, check out this blog!)
Not only will our Alumni Build Trip give you the opportunity to be a part of hope and change all over again, but this time around, the trip is longer, (a full two weeks!), and you'll be working on building projects in TWO of our destination countries - Dominican Republic and Haiti!
This trip is a great chance for you and the friends you've made on past trips to return together, to help those in need in a tangible way, and to be reminded that life really is about people, not stuff.
Spots are limited, so sign up now for what we know will be another life-changing trip!
Click here for more trip info!
Sincerely,
The Live Different Team
